DOC.brief_summary: This study compare oxytocin infusion spontaneous follow-up third-stage labor induce mid-trimester abortion . Patients randomize oxytocin infusion observation pharmacologic intervention . Primary outcome study complete abortion rate within two hour fetal delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Oxytocin Infusion vs. Spontaneous Follow-up Third-stage Labor After Second-trimester Abortion
DOC.criteria: Women midtrimester termination pregnancy 1324 gestational week If fetus placenta expel together Obstetrical haemorrhage need intervention Known prostaglandin allergy
